name: Evon Technologies

overview:
Offshore Software Development Evon’s key focus is Outsourcing Technology Services, with expertise ranging from consulting on business and technology, to creating innovative technology solutions.

Based in India, the company came into existence 4 years back and are in the domain of Web development, Mobile development, Multimedia development and Application development. Our company has expertise in technologies like Java/J2ee, Microsoft .net technologies, LAMP, mobile platforms etc.
